comments:
Executing Generator->Reload... on EMF project often produces
ConcurrentModificationException.  Stack trace follows.  I haven't managed to
come up with a consistent way to create this exception, but will append of
course if I do.  

The model currently in use is the base for another model via extension but I
believe that the error occurred fairly often before the model was extended.  

I have tried turning off "Refresh workspace automatically" but this does not
appear to have a material impact.

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException

Template changes to avoid doing an addAll of an empty list for resource delta
visitor have been committed to CVS.
The fix is available on the I200504141117 build.
